summary: A Private detective is hired to trace a woman who ran away and disappeared on her wedding day. The movie follows him and recounts the story of her life through her eyes and the eyes of those interviewed by the detective.
cast: Sandrine Kiberlain|Sergio Castellitto|Jean-François Stévenin|Aurore Clément|Chiara Mastroianni|Mireille Perrier|Samuel Le Bihan|Caroline Baehr|Jean-Louis Loca|Roschdy Zem|Frédéric Pierrot|Louis-Do de Lencquesaing|Didier Flamand|Marie Pailhes|Anh Duong|Eric Mitchell|Antonin Dedet|Éric Houzelot|Hubert Gaudard|Monique Vérité|Guy Boulonet|Jean-Pierre Thirion|Valérie Apert|Swann Willig|Barbara Jung|Sylvie Chol|Massima Bellancène|Carine Mendy|Valérie Dréville|Louise Pingaud|Paul Pingaud|Patricia Trautmann|Léonard Héberlé|Stéphane Guillon|Guy Amram|Yves Ulmann|Haguime Bendidi|Frank Gonzales|Alain Monne|Samir Boucabeil|Patrick Rameau|Fovéa|Kevin Long|Laurence Cormerais
title: Se vende
